channel.title: How Do i Run my server through FTP
channel.description:
Hello,
I have a registered domain that many know of www.1337scape.net and it came with an FTP, now I was once reading that if you want a 24/7 hour server, you can run it through FTP, and I have also noticed in client.java a code that sends the files to the FTP address, and I was wondering if anyone can get me some professional advice on how to do this.
Thank you,
eclipse245

item.title: How Do i Run my server through FTP
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

could u post that php thing? i want to use that instead of having to run it on my computer, and if u made it, would it work on a web host like freewebs? i tried figureing this out for my apache site stuff b4 but i cudnt get it to run a bat file on the site…

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i Run my server through FTP
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

http://www.egghelp.org/shell.htm

Read up on that, before you venture forth into the world of shells. Eggdrop bot is (more or less) relating to a bot on IRC, but the part about shell accounts is where you need to read.

item.source: How Do i Run my server through FTP

item.title: How Do i Run my server through FTP
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

I honestly don’t know about running a server through ftp, although I once used a java applet to manage remote IRC network. I’m sure it’s the same principle. I’d edit the IRCD and rehash the server to upload the changes, I’m sure it’s the same just upload the server files to a remote ftp, if you want to edit it from a remote computer, ensure you have access, then edit the .javas save it back to the FTP and rehash the server remotely.[br][size=1]Posted on: February 26, 2007, 09:54:46 PM[/size][hr]You might consider finding the code for a File Manager Java Applet, and putting the instructions for it to connect to a host computer.

Read full topic

item.title: How Do i Run my server through FTP
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

Ok this is going to be hard. I don’t know if this is what you should do. This will be considered hacking. I could make you a php file that will run a bat file on the server. All you would have to do is upload the files to the server and open up a page from your site and the server will restart. Do you think i should make this app for you?

Read full topic
